name: Stick Arena (itch)
description:
This is a largely unfinished prototype for a school project.

The game is a wave based arena game where massacring enemies rewards more ammunition cubes, that you can use to massacre them for longer. You also receive new weapons, not necessarily better, but they inflict more damage faster.

Expect various bugs as you experience the subpar journey through this master-crafted game.

Why the unique name of "Stick Arena"? I couldn't bother coming up with a better name.

Also, to exit the game, press ALT+ F4, the "give up" button doesn't work.
